:2
if 167, 176 15395562 or 147, 176 15395562 or 127, 176 15395562 or 107, 176 15395562 or 87, 176 15395562 or 67, 176 15395562 or 47, 176 15395562 or 167, 136 15395562 or 147, 136 15395562 or 127, 136 15395562 or 107, 136 15395562 or 87, 136 15395562 or 67, 136 15395562 or 47, 136 15395562 or 167, 116 15395562 or 147, 116 15395562 or 127, 116 15395562 or 107, 116 15395562 or 87, 116 15395562 or 67, 116 15395562 or 47, 116 15395562
goto 1
end_if

goto 2
:1
pause_script 18
pause_script 30
pause_script 36
pause_script 40
log hour min sec
wait 18000
resume_script 18
resume_script 30
resume_script 36
resume_script 40
end_if
